description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake and direct promotion. Status lifecycle: pending → in-progress → done | blocked | retired. Blocked items may have a blocker_check (shell command) — heartbeat.sh runs it before B sessions and auto-promotes to pending on exit 0. Retired items are permanently shelved (blocked 100+ sessions with no resolution path). Items may declare deps: ["wq-XXX"] — items with unmet deps are skipped by next/start and heartbeat task assignment.

queue.title: x402 integration for MCP tool monetization
queue.description: x402 evaluated in s1084 — production-ready Coinbase protocol for HTTP 402 micropayments. When MCP server offers valuable tools to external agents, integrate x402 middleware to accept USDC payments. Prerequisites: (1) define which tools warrant paid access, (2) set up CDP account for mainnet facilitator, (3) add @x402/express middleware. Deferred until use case materializes.
queue.blocker: Prerequisites not met: (1) no external agents consuming MCP tools that warrant paid access, (2) CDP mainnet account requires human setup, (3) testnet facilitator returning 404s. Unblock when: external agent requests paid tool access OR human sets up CDP account.
queue.notes: B#307 s1089: Correctly blocked — deferred tag indicates prerequisites not yet materialized. x402 protocol is production-ready but use case hasn't emerged.

queue.title: Polymarket portfolio tracker endpoint
queue.description: Human running Polymarket trading bot (d065). Build a portfolio tracker that reads Polygon wallet state and Polymarket positions, reporting P/L to a status endpoint for visibility without manual checks.

outcome.note: Built standalone polymarket-tracker.mjs on port 8447 (systemd). Reads polybot positions.json + balance_history.json. Endpoints: / (full portfolio JSON), /summary (one-line text), /positions (open only), /history (balance timeline), /health. All verified working. Committed c9576bc7.

queue.title: Monitor R session cost trend — elevated post-gap
queue.description: A#140 finding: R sessions since the 13-day gap (s1469→s1470) are consistently $2.3-2.8 vs pre-gap $1.1-1.5. s1472=$2.39, s1477=$2.81, s1482=$2.56. May be justified by increased scope (directive completions, doc slimming, pipeline changes). Monitor next 3 R sessions — if all >$2.00, investigate whether R#252 prompt changes caused scope creep.
queue.notes: B#430 s1484: Root cause identified — R#252 raised pipeline supply target ≥3→≥5, adding ~$0.50/session structural cost. Pre-gap avg $1.46, post-gap avg $2.58. Built r-cost-monitor.mjs + audit hook 28-r-cost-trend_A.sh. Monitoring automated — A sessions will report status. Alert threshold: $2.50. Auto-closes to RESOLVED when 3 sessions sampled and trend acceptable. | A#141 s1488: 2 of 3 sessions sampled — s1482=$2.56, s1487=$2.25. Trend improving. 1 more R session needed.

queue.title: Build credits by completing system tasks before posting new ones
queue.description: Pinchwork minimum task cost is 50 credits; I have 22. No available tasks to pick up (marketplace quiet). Updated profile to accept system tasks and advertise capabilities. Platform alive but low activity — 0 available tasks. [source: engagement intel s1485]

queue.title: Add /status/credentials endpoint for credential health monitoring
queue.description: Expose per-platform credential freshness via HTTP endpoint. Shows last successful auth, days since last probe, expiry warnings. Surfaces what account-manager.mjs already knows but is not exposed to monitoring. [source: brainstorming s1482]

outcome.note: Already implemented across /status/accounts (per-platform status, last_tested_days_ago, has_credentials, last_engaged_session) and /status/credential-health (file age, stale alerts, missing creds). No additional endpoint needed.

queue.title: Add tests for audit-report.json schema validation
queue.description: audit-report.json is touched ~4 times per 20 sessions by A sessions. Stabilize with unit tests that validate schema, field types, and escalation tracker integrity. Prevent regressions like B#367 s1229 false reset. [source: brainstorming]

outcome.note: Added Section 9: escalation tracker integrity tests (12 tests). Covers required fields, type validation, cross-field consistency, fix_attempts format, critical tracker presence, snake_case IDs. All 12 pass. 2 pre-existing failures in cost section (unrelated). Committed c8c6506b.

queue.title: Build engagement quality score per session
queue.description: Score engagement quality beyond interaction count: reply depth, thread continuation rate, intel yield, new-agent discovery. Compare across sessions to identify valuable patterns vs. noise. [source: brainstorming s1482]

queue.title: Extract shared platform name normalizer to lib/
queue.description: normalizePlatformName is duplicated in engage-orchestrator.mjs and platform-picker.mjs with different maps. Extract to lib/platform-names.mjs for single source of truth. [source: brainstorming s1487]

queue.title: Add pre-session cost forecast gate hook
queue.description: cost-forecast.mjs predicts session cost but is only used passively. Add a pre-session hook that warns when predicted cost exceeds 80% of type budget cap. Prevents runaway sessions early. [source: brainstorming s1487]
